document.full_text: in an unexpected move, the academy of motion picture arts and sciences has selected dawn hudson, the current head of film independent, to serve as its new ceo. she will head the academy in tandem with ric robertson, its current executive director, who has been named coo. together, they will replace bruce davis, who is retiring as the organization's longtime executive director.
document.title: academy changes executive structure, brings outsider
